flawed_nl_solution:
The discount is worth 300*0.2=$<<300*0.2=60>>60
So the lens cost 300-60=$<<300-60=420>>420
That means he saves 420-220=$<<420-220=200>>200 by buying the cheaper lens
#### 200

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 240, not 420. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
